nl: All employees are obligated to report to work by 9am. John is an employee. John reported to work at 8:30am. Did John fulfill his obligation?
All drivers are obligated to stop at red lights. Mary is a driver. Mary did not stop at the red light. Did Mary violate her obligation?
Adults are permitted to vote. Sarah is an adult. Is Sarah permitted to vote?
Minors are prohibited from purchasing alcohol. Tom is a minor. Is Tom prohibited from purchasing alcohol?
All vehicles must pay tolls, except emergency vehicles. An ambulance is an emergency vehicle. Must an ambulance pay tolls?
Parking is prohibited on weekdays. Parking is permitted on holidays. Today is a weekday and a holiday. Is parking permitted?
If you earn income, you are obligated to file taxes. Bob earns income. Is Bob obligated to file taxes?
A manager can delegate tasks to employees. Jane is a manager. Can Jane delegate tasks to employees?
If someone has a right to privacy, others have a duty not to invade it. Alice has a right to privacy. Do others have a duty not to invade Alice's privacy?
To sign a contract, one must have legal capacity. Minors lack legal capacity. Is a minor able to sign a contract?
Constitutional law takes precedence over statutory law. This statute conflicts with the constitution. Does the constitution prevail?
In criminal cases, the prosecution must prove guilt. The prosecution has not proven guilt. Is the defendant guilty?
Medical procedures require patient consent. The patient has given consent. Can the procedure proceed?
Property owners are liable for injuries on their property due to negligence. The owner was negligent. A visitor was injured. Is the owner liable?
Claims must be filed within 2 years. The incident occurred 3 years ago. Can the claim be filed?
